name: WordPress Better Chat Support for Messenger plugin缺少授权漏洞
product: ["WordPress Better Chat Support for Messenger plugin <=1.2.18"]
description: WordPress Better Chat Support for Messenger plugin是一个为WordPress网站提供实时聊天功能的工具，支持FacebookMessenger集成，允许用户通过聊天窗口与访客即时沟通。WordPress Better Chat Support for Messenger plugin存在缺少授权漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致访问控制不当。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/better-chat-support/
patch: WordPress Better Chat Support for Messenger plugin缺少授权漏洞的补丁
